text: Ana ngakuiona yanti Allah akwendesya mawunde gawula mwambolembole kaneka ni kugalumbikanya yalumo, kaneko ni kugawika maunjilimaunjili, basi ni nkujionaga wula jili nkukopoka chilikati chakwecho, soni akutulusyaga kuumila kwinani - mâ€™matumbi (gamatalila) - mwelemo (akutulusyaga) matalila, basi ni akasamputa nago jwansachile ni kugawambasya ku jwansachile. Kumulika kwa kumesya kwakwe kukusigalaga panandi kuti kutyosye kulola
